clumpy.Palette¶

class clumpy.Palette(states=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Define a palette, i.e. a set of states.

Parameters

states (list of States, default=None) – A list of States object. Ignored if None.

Methods

add(state)

Append a state to the palette’s states.

extract(infos)

Extract a sub palette

get(info)

Get a state from the palette.

get_id(info)

Get a state’s index from the palette.

get_list_of_labels_values_colors()

Get the labels list, the values list and the colors list.

get_list_of_values()

Get the values list.

merge(palette[, inplace])

Merge to another palette.

remove(info[, inplace])

Remove a state

sort([inplace])

Sort the palette according states values.
add(state)[source]¶

Append a state to the palette’s states.

Parameters

state (State) – The state to append.

Returns

self – The self object.

Return type

Palette

extract(infos)[source]¶

Extract a sub palette

Parameters

infos (list(int or State)) – List of initial state information which can be the object, the state’s value or the state’s label.

Returns

palette – The extracted palette.

Return type

Palette

get(info)[source]¶

Get a state from the palette.

Parameters

info (int or str) – The state information which can be the state’s value or the state’s label. If two states share the same label, only the first one to occur is returned.

Returns

state – The requested state.

Return type

State

get_id(info)[source]¶

Get a state’s index from the palette.

Parameters

info (State or int or str) – The state information which can be the object, the state’s value or the state’s label. If two states share the same label, only the first one to occur is returned.

Returns

i – The requested state’s index.

Return type

int

get_list_of_labels_values_colors()[source]¶

Get the labels list, the values list and the colors list.

Returns

  • labels (list of str) – The list of labels.

  • values (list of int) – The list of values.

  • colors (list of str) – The list of colors.

get_list_of_values()[source]¶

Get the values list.

Returns

values – The list of values.

Return type

list of int

merge(palette, inplace=False)[source]¶

Merge to another palette.

Parameters

  • palette (Palette) – The other palette

  • inplace (bool, default=False) – If True, perform operation in-place.

Returns

palette – If inplace=True, return the self object, else return a new palette with sorted states.

Return type

Palette

remove(info, inplace=False)[source]¶

Remove a state

Parameters

  • info (State or int or str) – The state information which can be the object, the state’s value or the state’s label. If two states share the same label, only the first one to occur is returned.

  • inplace (bool, default=False) – If True, perform operation in-place.

Returns

palette – If inplace=True, return the self object, else return a new palette with sorted states.

Return type

Palette

sort(inplace=False)[source]¶

Sort the palette according states values.

Parameters

inplace (bool, default=False) – If True, perform operation in-place.

Returns

palette – If inplace=True, return the self object, else return a new palette with sorted states.

Return type

Palette
